data.text:
London: Faber & Faber, (2005), (1967).

Pristine, unread As New true First Edition copy in like dust jacket of this critically acclaimed title, shortlisted for the Booker Prize, the 2006 Arthur C. Clarke Award and the 2005 National Book Critics Circle Award. It also received an ALA Alex Award in 2006. TIME magazine named it the Best Novel of 2005 and included this title in its 100 Best English-language Novels from 1923 to 2005. Basis, of course, for the prestigious 2010 Mark Romanek-directed film. This stunning copy is boldly signed on the title page by the internationally award-winning author.

. Item #10057
